summary: This adds a nice, compact home in a cave close to Riverwood, equipped with general furniture you can find in a house.
descriptionHtml:
=====ASSASSIN\'S RETREAT=====

-Description-
        I made this mod so I can have my cosy, compact, but useful little cave for my early-game characters. I then decided to share this to the world. It\'s my third project I\'ve done with the Creation Kit, however the first one I posted to the Nexus.

-Location-
       It is located close to Riverwood, blended into a mountain. If you look right on the road from Helgen to Riverwood you should see a small wooden door with a litlle roof and a torch nearby. It has a map marker, so it shouldn\'t be too hard to find.

-Content-
       While I wanted to make it efficient, but primitive, I did not add any bookshelves, weapon racks or manequins, however there are alot of things available.

-Bed
-Alchemy Table
-Enchanting Table
-Cooking Spot
-Smithing Area (all exept Smelter)
-World Map
-Ingredient Farm
-Lots of Storage (1 End Table, 1 Dresser, 2 Strongboxes, 2 Chests, 1 Sathcel, 1 Urn)

-Instalation-
      Place the file in Skyrim/Data folder, and enable it in the Launchers Data Files or just use the NMM (Nexus Mod Manager). To uninstall simply delete the file.
author: TheGreenDragon
